input_text:
Job Title: Engineering/Marketing Admin

Location: Vancouver, WA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Engineering/Marketing Administrator
Major Goals
This position will support project and office administration as well as sales/marketing and business development efforts in our growth-oriented professional engineering consulting firm. 
Qualifications· Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and work independently as well as in team environments, often under tight deadline situations. · Possesses a friendly, collaborative demeanor and enjoys working with others in a creative environment toward shared goals.· High level of attention to detail and adherence to high quality standards.· Demonstrated solid writing, editing, and proofreading skills. · Proficient in Microsoft Outlook, Word, and Excel. · Strong knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite (InDesign) and presentation software (PowerPoint) along with strong presentation design skills. · Willingness and ability to take on projects as reasonable without extensive technical oversight. Ability to take ownership of a project and see it through to completion.· Ability to interact, support, and motivate internally, as well as ability to professionally interface with external contacts (clients, subconsultants, vendors, etc.).
Key Result Areas
1. Administrative Activities a. Create project files, both electronic and file folders. b. Support office in the establishment and upkeep of hard copy and electronic project filing systems, archiving, and general organizational efforts to keep office running smoothly. c. Assist in maintenance of Project Manager/ Quality Management Manual. d. Organize and maintain technical library and conduct research when needed. e. Filing of project information in accordance with company standards.f. Other administrative and project coordination activities, including but not limited to: o Arrange flight, hotel, and car reservations for employees on company business. o Organize and execute staff meetings and other office functions. o Maintain document retention and destruction policies. Review project files on annual basis for compliance. Act, as needed, to bring project files into compliance. 
2. Office Management Activities a. Maintain the smooth operation of the telephone system, printers, and other office equipment including knowledge of maintenance agreements.b. Maintain office asset inventory and add new inventory as needed. c. Order workroom and lunchroom supplies. d. Coordinate the check out/in of office equipment in the equipment pool. e. Maintain company office calendar.f. On monthly basis, generate copy count report. g. Assist with new employee orientation. h. Manage weekly and monthly staff meetings for the office. 
3. Project Activities a. Prepare project deliverables, including transmittals, proposals, letters, reports, calculation packages. b. Work with engineers during construction administration. Track deadlines for RFI’s, Submittals, Action items, etc. and ensure timely task completion. c. Meet with Project Managers on a weekly basis and assist them as required. Communicate daily with project team regarding deliverable schedules. d. Review all external communications (reports/memos/letters) for compliance with WRK Document Standards. e. Create project public folders in Outlook and associated email requirements for storage. f. Assist as needed with daily preparation of drafting calendar for independent contractor, and upload project drafting onto WRK Engineers OneDrive site. Download and file drafting the next morning when completed. 
4. Marketing a. Work with Project Managers to respond to project pursuits by helping produce high-quality and persuasive proposals and presentations, including formatting, writing/editing, graphic layout and production, and efficient/timely production. b. Assist with graphic design of presentation and collateral materials.c. Work with Project Managers to develop and execute targeted advertising and social media campaigns.d. Provide general business development support by developing and maintaining client mailing lists and marketing files.e. Assist with input and accuracy of Client Resource Management (CRM) information. f. Develop, update, and maintain marketing materials including, including but not limited to:· Marketing department standards, project information, photography files, and past proposals· Project information sheets· Personnel resumes Classification:This position is classified as full-time, exempt.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Engineering/Marketing Admin
output_json.summary: Support project and office administration, sales/marketing, and business development efforts.

Proficiency in Microsoft Outlook, Word, and Excel
Strong knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite (InDesign) and presentation software (PowerPoint)

Work with engineers during construction administration
Assist with daily preparation of drafting calendar
Develop and execute targeted advertising and social media campaigns
Input and accuracy of CRM information
